pr_title: Handle create page source for Druid segment on s3

timeline.bodyText:
Is there anything else we need escaping in the uri?  something like '?' and  '='.
I'm thinking if we can use any existing '%' encoding function to do this.
timeline.author: beinan

replies.bodyText: Changed to URLEncoder to process special chars in general.
replies.author: jinyangli34

timeline.bodyText: extract s3a, s3n, S2Schema and etc. as constants?
timeline.author: beinan

timeline.bodyText: Is it better to throw a PrestoException(DRUID_METADATA_ERROR`, ...)?  also for line 144
timeline.author: beinan

timeline.bodyText: Any chance to switch by the enum you just defined -- DeepStorageType ?
timeline.author: beinan

timeline.bodyText: Any document or github issue we can link here rather than a piece of source code?
timeline.author: beinan

replies.bodyText: I'm removing the link as current code looks self-explained after clean up. Let me know if you prefer a github issue link here.
replies.author: jinyangli34

replies.bodyText: Nice work, I think we can just remove the link.  Thanks!
replies.author: beinan

timeline.bodyText:
s/S3_ZIP/S3/g
zip is the file format, we just use S3 for storage type
timeline.author: zhenxiao

replies.bodyText: Updated enum variable name, while keeping the type name as defined from Druid.
replies.author: jinyangli34
